name: Crazy Monster Jump 3D
description:
Treasure, Laser Trap, Maya Temple. Let's enjoy this Crazy Jump Trip!

Crazy Monster Jump is simple tap to jump Game. Touch Screen to jump and avoid coming laser trap. How many traps can YOU pass! Be Warned: Crazy Monster Jump is INSANELY addictive!

Otherwise, Crazy Monster Jump is one of the best-looking and Realistic 3D games of its genre which also runs smoothly on older devices. Endless and challenging jumping fun! Tons of traps to complete! Come On!

Features:
-Realistic 3D Environment and shocked Effect
-Evil Pretty Small Monster!
-Endless of challenge
-High-quality sound effects and nice graphic!
-User friendly interface
-And more fun!
